title: Fatal error: runtime: out of memory crash
body:
Memory usage for rclone balloons to consume 100% of memory, 32GB in this case, for a 7 GB file.

> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
rclone v1.36-231-g575e779bβ

> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Ubuntu 64 bit

> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Amazon Drive

> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
./rclone -vv --dump-headers --dump-bodies copy ~/file.mov acd:Videos/

> A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
:~/rclone-v1.36-231-g575e779bβ-linux-amd64$ ./rclone -vv --dump-headers --dump-bodies copy ~/Videos/file.mov acdde:Videos/
````
